title: Will One Tuscan Port Stall Italyâ€™s Drive for Energy Independence?
description: The residents of tiny Piombino understand the need to replace Russian gas imports. They just want a huge regasification vessel anchored somewhere else.
dc:creator: Gaia Pianigiani
media:credit: Chiara Negrello for The New York Times
media:description: The site in Piombino, Italy, where a 1,000-foot ship is to dock to prepare liquefied natural gas for onshore use.
